title: Halden’s Confession Broadcast
outcome: A delayed video from Halden appears on every public screen three days after the chaos. In a heartfelt confession, he reveals his own struggles with the BCI and the hidden flaws that doomed it. The city erupts in soul-searching and debate as each faction reimagines the future beyond surveillance.

events.description: A previously hidden video message from Halden plays citywide. He apologizes for BCI’s abuses, reveals he too was secretly flagged, and urges Stenograd to choose compassion over judgment.
Stunned residents flood the streets in mass assemblies. They debate Halden’s words and begin to forgive those who suffered under or enforced the BCI.
The Directorate scrambles to suppress the confession but is blocked by Innovators and Oksana, who leak further supporting evidence of BCI’s injustices.
Mutual forgiveness ceremonies and public testimonies gain huge followings, shifting the city toward reconciliation rather than settling old scores.
Council holds its first fully public debate since BCI’s rise, allowing all voices—once silenced by scoring—to shape the future openly.
